name: Print All Permutations Of A String Iteratively
description:
Input Format
A String
Output Format
All permutations of the given string(one in a line).
Question Video
COMMENT
Constraints
1 <= length of string <= 15
Sample Input
abc

Sample Output
abc
bac
cab
acb
bca
cba
